title: 【星系】 Galacticraft update check failed! Trying again in 15 seconds！
author: etter-xw
txt_content:
服务器安装星系mod之后每次开服都会弹出来这个报错
 Galacticraft update check failed! Trying again in 15 seconds
这个问题咋解决
1.7.10 KC端
星系Galacticraft-Planets-1.7-3.0.12.504
星系GalacticraftCore-1.7-3.0.12.504

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content: 关掉星系的更新检测吧- - config/GalactiCraft/core.cfg里找一下update
